title: Australian steel : progress in Port Kembla
brief_description: Iron and steel production at Port Kembla, N.S.W. is linked with quarrying limestone at Iron Monarch and Cockatoo Island, limestones at Marulan and coal mining. A documentary style explanation of processes , products and progression of iron and steel production and coal mining.
